doc:
Ron Rifkin https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ron_Rifkin 0 Ron Rifkin (born October 31, 1939 as Saul M. Rifkin) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles as Arvin Sloane on the spy drama Alias, Saul Holden on the American family drama Brothers Sisters, and District Attorney Ellis Loew in Curtis Hanson's Oscar winning film L.A. Confidential. Ron_Rifkin ( born October_31_,_1939 as Saul_M._Rifkin ) is an_American_actor . He is_best_known for his_roles as Arvin_Sloane on the_spy_drama_Alias , Saul_Holden on the_American_family_drama_Brothers_ , and District_Attorney_Ellis_Loew in Curtis_Hanson 's_Oscar_winning_film_L.A._Confidential .
